update t_application
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parameter_type = #{parameterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
developer_name = #{developerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grader = #{grader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_parameter = #{applyParameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
synopsis = #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online_time = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_application set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter_type = #{parameterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, developer_name = #{developerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grader = #{grader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_parameter = #{applyParameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, synopsis = #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online_time = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update t_application set is_delete='y' where id=#{id}
update t_application set status='已上线' where id=#{id}
update t_application set status='已下线' where id=#{id}
